bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of red speckles of varying size on the skin. They are not elevated and commonly are not associated with any abnormal sensation such as pain and itching. Also, they are not connected to any other physical condition. Zhu bing yuan hou lun 諸病源候論 31: 面及 身體皮肉變赤，與肉色不同，或如手大，或如錢大，亦不癢痛，謂之赤 疵 , “If on one’s face or body the skin changes to red, and differs from the color of the surrounding flesh, sometimes this being as large as a hand, sometimes as small as a coin, and if there is neither itching nor pain, this is called ‘ red blemish-illness ’”.
